channel.title: Comments on: JavaScript ASP.NET Data Templates (or, I was missing Data Templates in Silverlight …)

item.title: By: christmas
item.dc:creator: christmas
item.description: I think Data Templates in Silverlight and WPF are the very things I need to build user interfaces. Thanks for sharing with us such precious information. Your pointers and pieces of advice are of great usage for me.
item.content:encoded: I think Data Templates in Silverlight and WPF are the very things I need to build user interfaces. Thanks for sharing with us such precious information. Your pointers and pieces of advice are of great usage for me.
